### Point {#a13e3fc0b72be6e5ed6700635471501f9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>struct anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeGenPrepare.cpp&#125;::TypePromotionTransaction::InsertionHandler anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeGenPrepare.cpp&#125;::TypePromotionTransaction::InsertionHandler::Point</>}>
Position of an instruction.

Either an instruction:
<ul>
<li>Is the first in a basic block: BB is used.</li>
<li>Has a previous instruction: PrevInst is used.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l03279">3279</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
